com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking

Interface CheckCapabilities

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckCapabilitiesImpl

    public interface CheckCapabilities
    The CheckCapabilities are providing the check time capabilities needed by text extraction.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CheckCapabilities EXTRACTION_CHECK
      The CheckCapabilities used while an extraction check performed by OptionDialogCallback.performExtractionCheck(com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.settings.client.ClientSettings) .

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isUseHardExclusion() 

    • Field Detail

      • EXTRACTION_CHECK

        static final CheckCapabilities EXTRACTION_CHECK
        The CheckCapabilities used while an extraction check performed by OptionDialogCallback.performExtractionCheck(com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.settings.client.ClientSettings) . The extraction check is performed via option dialog to mark the extracted text. See: CheckType.FLAG_EXTRACTION

    • Method Detail

      • isUseHardExclusion

        boolean isUseHardExclusion()
        Returns:
        true, if use hard exclusion is defined on server side.
